Instance.description: A Social Group that contains a group of Sims throwing objects at each other.

TunableTuple.name: adjustment_interval
TunableTuple.description: How long Sims wait before adjusting positions.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: adjustment_mixers
TunableList.description: List of mixers that we push as possible adustment options. Sims should not try to adjust right after running these mixers.

TunableTuple.name: scoring_function
TunableTuple.description: The scoring function for this group.

Tunable.name: adjustment_distance
Tunable.description: Any position that requires the Sim to be at a distance less than this value will be penalized.

TunableTuple.name: location_tests
TunableTuple.description: Tests to run on the goal location to validate if it should be discouraged when using this social group.

TunableVariant.name: validate_is_outside
TunableVariant.description: If enabled goals that do not match the outside condition will be discouraged.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: If True goals outside will be encouraged, if false only goals on the inside will be encouraged.

TunableVariant.name: validate_snowmask
TunableVariant.description: If enabled goals that do not match the snowmask value will be discouraged. This is used for winter to guarantee cases like snowball fight the Sims readjust and move around in places where there is snow.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Value snowmask should be greater than to pass this test.

Tunable.name: maximum_distance
Tunable.description: Any distance to another Sim over this amount will be penalized.

Tunable.name: minimum_distance
Tunable.description: Any distance to another Sim under this amount will be penalized.
